metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5463 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An authorization issue was discovered in the GitLab CE/EE CI badge images endpoint which could result in disclosure of the build status. This vulnerability was addressed in 12.1.2, 12.0.4, and 11.11.6.

notes.Note: msalvatore> Affects all previous GitLab CE/EE versions.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
